LanguageData.Outposts.Settings.Title: Vanilla Expanded Framework - Outposts
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Create.Label: Create Outpost
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Create.Desc: Create a new outpost using this caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Lost.Label: Outpost Lost
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Lost.Text: Regretfully, due to the deaths of all inhabitants, the outpost of {0} has been lost to us.
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.BattleWon.Label: Outpost Battle Won
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.BattleWon.Text: We have successfully won the battle for {0}.
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Items.Label: Items From {0}
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Items.Text: You have received the follow items from the outpost {0}:
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.AddPawn.Label: Add Pawn
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.AddPawn.Desc: Transfer a pawn from this caravan to the outpost
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Pack.Label: Pack
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Pack.Desc: Begin packing this outpost back into a caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Remove.Label: Remove Pawn
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Remove.Desc: Remove a pawn from this outpost into a new caravan
LanguageData.Outposts.Command.Remove.Only1: Cannot remove pawns: Only 1 inhabitant. If you want to remove this outpost, select "Pack".
LanguageData.Outposts.NotSkilledEnough: Pawns are not skilled enough, need a cumulative {0} skill of at least {1}
